quote: Manifesting is a lot like making a cake. The things needed are supplied by you, the mixing is done by your mind and the baking is done in the oven of the universe.
author: Stephen Richards,  Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

quote: It does not manifest so that you can believe in it. You believe in it so that it can manifest.
author: Lauren Zimmerman

quote: Manifestation is a process by which we transform seemingly unrealizable imaginations to reality.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: While intent is the seed of manifestation, action is the water that nourishes the seed. Your actions must reflect your goals in order to achieve true success.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: It is action that creates motivation.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Such a simple concept, yet so true: that which we manifest is before us; we are the creators of our own destiny. Be it through intention or ignorance, our successes and our failures have been brought on by none other than ourselves.
author: Garth Stein,  The Art of Racing in the Rain

quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: We make our purpose.
author: Carl Sagan,  The Varieties of Scientific Experience: A Personal View of the Search for God

quote: Life finds its purpose and fulfillment in the expansion of happiness.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: Grass in a Sidewalk Crack Grass sprounting miraculously in a sidewalk crack is a metaphor forlousy maintenance.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Life is a series of waves to be embraced and overcome.
author: Danny Meyer

quote: Live life with a purpose and live it full out.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Life is a lively process of becoming.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: INTENT reveals desire; ACTION reveals commitment.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: To live long and achieve happiness, cultivate the art of radiating happiness.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Inspiration fires you up; motivation keeps you burning.
author: Stuart Aken

quote: When you are just EXISTING, life happens to you… and you manage; when you are truly LIVING, you happen to life… and you lead.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Self-observation is the first step of inner unfolding.
author: Amit Ray,  Yoga and Vipassana: An Integrated Life Style

quote: Don't mistake activity with achievement.
author: John Wooden

quote: You create your own masterpiece as your actions draw pictures of your life canvas.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Through learning we re-create ourselves. Through learning we become able to do something we never were able to do. Through learning we reperceive the world and our relationship to it. Through learning we extend our capacity to create, to be part of the generative process of life
author: Peter M. Senge

quote: I think of myself as a catalyst of action and a messenger of hope, turning people onto themselves and turning people onto their dreams.
author: Les Brown

quote: You have to participate relentlessly in the manifestation of your own blessings.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: Each of our acts makes a statement as to our purpose.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Let today be the day you stop having conflict between your actions and your goals and finally align your greatest intent with your purposeful actions, creating a universal symphony serenading your success!
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Success is the progressive realization of predetermined, worthwhile, personal goals.
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: We fill our lives with meaning by serving endlessly and by learning to transcend our consciousness to a higher consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Part of being of a true existentialist is wanting to be what we make ourselves be by the way we choose to act, as opposed to making excuses for the way we act and regretting it.
author: Gary Cox,  How to Be an Existentialist: or How to Get Real, Get a Grip and Stop Making Excuses

quote: I arise full of eagerness and energy, knowing well what achievement lies ahead of me.
author: Zane Grey

quote: In motivating people, you've got to engage their minds and their hearts. I motivate people, I hope, by example - and perhaps by excitement, by having productive ideas to make others feel involved.
author: Rupert Murdoch

quote: You've been given the innate power to shape your life...but you cannot just speak change, you have to LIVE change. Intent paired with action builds the bridge to success. You can't just want it; you have to do it, live it...BE it! Success isn't something you have, it's something you DO!
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: As we learn, grow and prosper, consciousness takes on new expressions and intrinsically searches for purpose and meaning.
author: Joseph Rain

quote: Find your life’s purpose and dare to pursue it.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: Love is the outreach of self toward completion.
author: Ralph W. Sockman

quote: The secret to success is constancy of purpose.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: When you know that everything matters—that every move counts as much as any other—you will begin living a life of permanent purpose.
author: Andy Andrews

quote: All beautiful distractions, ignites from you.
author: V.S. Atbay

quote: [E]ducation is a holistic endeavor that involves the whole person, including our bodies, in a process of formation that aims our desires, primes our imagination, and orients us to the world -- all before we ever start thinking about it.
author: James K.A. Smith,  Desiring the Kingdom: Worship, Worldview, and Cultural Formation

quote: Motivation gets you going; Inspiration keeps you going.
author: Todd Stocker,  Refined: Turning Pain Into Purpose

quote: Self-Motivation [10w] "Today I'll do something more extraordinarythan I did yesterday.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Once you can let go of illusion and draw upon a more universal source of motivation then you will re connect with your true purpose on Earth.
author: Gary Markwick

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: The ethos of redemption is realized in self-mastery, by means of temperance, that is, continence of desires.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: For the human experience, life in the natural world seems to require the application of meaning, in order to evoke purpose.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Try for once to justify the meaning of your existence as it were a posteriori by setting yourself an aim, a goal... an exalted and noble 'to this end.' Perish in pursuit of this and only this
author: Friedrich Nietzsche,  Untimely Meditations

quote: Your determination and actions define your destination.
author: Debasish Mridha
